title: [[**Siddharth**]{style="font-weight: 500;"} Vishwanath]{style="font-size: 35px; text-shadow: 0 0 2px black; font-weight: 100; font-family: 'Saira Semi Condensed', sans-serif;"}

markdown.headingText: [[**Siddharth**]{style="font-weight: 500;"} Vishwanath]{style="font-size: 35px; text-shadow: 0 0 2px black; font-weight: 100; font-family: 'Saira Semi Condensed', sans-serif;"}
markdown.markdown:
::: {style="text-align: right;"} ::: :::: {.grid} ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-5 style="text-align: left;"}
::: {style="text-align: center; font-size: 1.5em; margin-top: 10px;"} [ ](https://linkedin.com/in/sidv23) · [ ](https://github.com/sidv23) · [ ](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=7TQaHEEAAAAJ&hl=en) · [ ](mailto:suv87@psu.edu) ::: ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-1 style="text-align: left;"} ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6 style="text-align: justify;"} I am a Ph.D. student in the [Department of Statistics](http://stat.psu.edu/) at [Penn State University](https://www.psu.edu/), advised by [Dr. Bharath Sriperumbudur](http://personal.psu.edu/bks18/). I am also a research assistant with the [Statistical Consulting Center](https://scc.stat.psu.edu/) at Penn State. Prior to joining Penn State, I worked as a quantitative researcher at Goldman Sachs from 2016 to 2017, and as a model validation quant at Nomura from 2015 to 2016. I graduated from the [Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur](https://www.iitk.ac.in/) with an M.Sc.(Integrated) in Mathematics and Statistics. ::: :::: :::: {.grid} ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-7 style="text-align: left;"} ## Education {{< fa graduation-cap >}}   Ph.D. Candidate, Statistics
[_Penn State University_]{.dodgerblue} {{< fa graduation-cap >}}   M.Sc. (Integrated), Mathematics
[_Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur_]{.dodgerblue} ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-5 style="text-align: left;"} ## Interests * Topological data analysis * Statistical learning theory * Robust statistics * Generative models You can find out more about my work [here](research.qmd). ::: ::::
